title: Year in Review not Working

embed.description: Here are all my game stats proving how much I crushed it in the 2018 season.

body:
Hey there,

Just writing on behalf of a friend of mine, but when either of us try to access his year in review it stays on the loading screen both in-client and browser. Does this work for anyone else? Or is it broken and if so is there a way to fix it. Thanks

replies.body: Seems to work for me. Can you try on a different browser?

Trying a different browser might work. I tried it on a few myself, and it worked fine on both Chrome and Firefox, but on IE it seemed to think that no summoners existed... I think IE is being a bit slow on the uptake...
